agawinisuru mohan piris, pi.ee. rathnayaka, priyasath dep yana shreshtadhikarana winisuru mandulla idiriyehi me pethsam kandawana ladi.ehidi nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya wenuwen peni siti janadhipathi nithignya sanjiwa jayawardhana mahatha prakasha kale shreshtadhikaranaya mita pera niyoga kala paridi ehi thawakalika karyalayak kompanynyawidiya, da soyisa patumanga anka 33 darana sthanayehi ikuth sikurada sita sanduda thek pihituwa thibu bawaya.ehi pamini kompanynyawidiya padinchikaruwan thunsiya dahahath denaku (317) siya ahimi wu niwasa wenuwen kuli dimana laba ganimatada ekasiya hata hathara (164) denaku wandi laba ganimatada kamaththa prakasha kara athi bawa janadhipathi nithignyawaraya kiya.ema pradeshayehi parchasayak rupiyal laksha hathalis thuna bagin thakseru kirimak rajaye thakserukaru wisin sidu kara athayi ee mahatha kiya.
